data.detail: Campaign Offer: Pegasus BolBol members who book Light Package tickets for the specified international routes between 16 December 2024 and 30 March 2025, for flights booked on 4-5 December, can enjoy prices from 5€ + taxes! In addition, for guests purchasing the Light Package, additional cabin baggage allowance is €5 and 12 kg Check-in baggage allowance is €5! You can also choose the Saver package by paying an additional €10 on top of the Light package ticket price! Book your flights at flypgs.com and the Pegasus mobile app and don't miss out on this opportunity valid for 150,000 seats!.
data.valid_offer_dates: The campaign is valid for flights booked between 4 December,  2024 and 5 December (from 4 December 2024 at 09:15 local time in Türkiye until 5 December,  2024 at 23:59, provided that the sale, payment and ticketing are completed) and on flights flights operated within the valid campaign dates and routes specified here.
data.valid_flight_dates: The campaign offer applies to flight bookings between 16 December 2024 and 30 March 2025 (from 00:01 on 16 December 2024 until 23:59 on 30 March 2025 according to local time in Türkiye) and on selected international flight routes listed below.
data.offer_eligibility: Only Pegasus BolBol members can avail of the offer. If you are not yet Pegasus BolBol member you can easily sign up for a Pegasus BolBol membership free of charge.
data.valid_offer_routes: The offer is valid for a total of 150,000 seats on selected flights on the international routes listed below. Northern Cyprus flights are not included in the offer and it cannot be used for ticketing other than the routes listed below. The offer is only valid on flights operated by Pegasus. Joint flights with different airlines are excluded from the scope of the offer.
data.fees:
Benefit from the offer on the following selected direct international routes, with prices starting from €5 + taxes.  
The Passenger Charge consists of (a) base fare, (b) fuel charge, (c) airport tax, (d) check-in charge and (e) service charge. The taxes excluded within the scope of the offer are the Airport Tax (c), listed above. Taxes include the passenger service fee or similar cost/tax items paid to the airport/terminal operator in accordance with the applicable tariffs in relation to the relevant scheduled flights. 
Prices from €5 + taxes are valid for selected flights on the international routes listed below and only applicable to the Light Package. Prices may vary depending on the selected flight (route, date, time, etc.). 
Additional products and services (such as seat selection, meal selection, additional baggage) and packages added to the Total Transportation Fee will be charged separately. In addition, within the scope of the offer, cabin baggage allowance for passengers purchasing the Light Package can be purchased for €5 and 12 kg check-in baggage allowance can be purchased for €5. You can also choose the Saver package by paying an additional €10 on top of the Light package ticket price!
data.number_of_seats: The number of seats offered in the fare class related to the offer is limited to the number of seats and is 150,000 in total. If the number of seats sells out before the end of the offer period, the offer will automatically end immediately and no claims can be made subject to this offer..
